trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 비주얼 디자이너에서 디자인 타임 지원을 제공는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control is used as a container for other controls, especially when controls are generated programmatically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>컨트롤은 컨테이너에 사용 다른 컨트롤에 컨트롤을 프로그래밍 방식으로 생성 되는 경우에 특히.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: The PanelDesigner class provides design-time support for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> controls in a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: PanelDesigner 클래스에 대 한 디자인 타임 지원을 제공 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>비주얼 디자이너에서 컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: However, for all new implementations of the Panel control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> instead of the PanelDesigner.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 모든 Panel 컨트롤의 새 구현에 대 한 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner>는 PanelDesigner 대신.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner>

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 비주얼 디자이너에서 소스 뷰에서 디자인 뷰로 전환 하면 태그 소스 코드가 연결 된 설명 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>제어 구문 분석 되 고 디자인 화면에 컨트롤의 디자인 타임 버전이 만들어집니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 소스 뷰로 다시 전환 하는 경우 디자인 타임 컨트롤 태그 소스 코드에 유지 되 고 웹 페이지에 대 한 태그를 편집 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A> method maps a specified property and value to a specified markup style.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A>메서드는 지정한 속성 및 값을 지정 된 태그 스타일으로 매핑합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached%2A> method provides notification when a behavior is attached to the designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached%2A>메서드는 동작이 디자이너에 연결 될 때 알림을 제공 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner"></xref> class.

The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 내부적으로 생성 하는.NET Framework는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner>연결 된 만들 때 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>컨트롤 또는 디자인 화면에서 해당 컨트롤의 복사본입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Maps a specified property and value to a specified markup style.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 속성 및 값을 지정 된 태그 스타일에 매핑됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The MapPropertyToStyle method provides special handling for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.BackImageUrl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.HorizontalAlign%2A> properties, but calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A> base method for all other values of the `propName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: MapPropertyToStyle 메서드 제공에 대 한 특수 처리는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.BackImageUrl%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.HorizontalAlign%2A>속성, 하지만 호출에서 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A>기본의 다른 모든 값에 대 한 메서드는 `propName` 매개 변수.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.HorizontalAlign%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.BackImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the property name.
An object that is the property value.
Provides notification when a behavior is attached to the designer.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너에 동작이 연결 될 때 알림을 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The OnBehaviorAttached method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached%2A> base method.

Then the OnBehaviorAttached maps the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.BackImageUrl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.HorizontalAlign%2A> properties to the appropriate style by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A> method, if these properties are defined.
trans-unit.target: OnBehaviorAttached 매핑하는 다음의 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.BackImageUrl%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.HorizontalAlign%2A>속성을 사용 하 여 적절 한 스타일은 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A>메서드를 이러한 속성이 정의 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.HorizontalAlign%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.BackImageUrl%2A>
